alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 3:29PM CDT until August 28 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Eastern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 329 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from McFarland to near South Beloit, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Janesville, Watertown, Whitewater, Fort Atkinson, Elkhorn, Delavan, Jefferson, Lake Geneva, Lake Mills, Milton, East Troy, Waterloo, Williams Bay, Walworth, Johnson Creek, Clinton, Palmyra, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Sharon and Darien. People attending The UW- Whitewater Move In should seek safe shelter immediately! TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
